lexUnit.name: scientist.n

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: a person who is studying or has expert knowledge of one or more of the natural or physical sciences.
